segment.source: Publishing Servers Node
segment.target: Publishing Servers Node

segment.source: Publishing Servers Node
segment.target: Publishing Servers Node

segment.source: Publishing Servers Node
segment.target: Publishing Servers Node

segment.source: The Publishing Servers node is one level below the Application Virtualization node in the Scope pane of the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.
segment.target: The Publishing Servers node is one level below the Application Virtualization node in the Scope pane of the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.

segment.source: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of publishing servers.
segment.target: When you select this node, the Results pane displays a list of publishing servers.

segment.source: Right-click the Publishing Servers node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click the Publishing Servers node to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Server
segment.target: New Server

segment.source: This menu item displays the New Server Wizard.
segment.target: This menu item displays the New Server Wizard.

segment.source: This wizard consists of two pages:
segment.target: This wizard consists of two pages:

segment.source: Enter a server display name and server type:
segment.target: Enter a server display name and server type:

segment.source: Display Name—Enter a name that you want displayed for the server.
segment.target: Display Name—Enter a name that you want displayed for the server.

segment.source: This field is blank by default.
segment.target: This field is blank by default.

segment.source: Type—Choose the server type from the drop-down list of server types.
segment.target: Type—Choose the server type from the drop-down list of server types.

segment.source: Specify the connection settings for the server:
segment.target: Specify the connection settings for the server:

segment.source: Host Name—Enter the name or IP address for the server.
segment.target: Host Name—Enter the name or IP address for the server.

segment.source: Port—Enter a numeric value that corresponds to the port number.
segment.target: Port—Enter a numeric value that corresponds to the port number.

segment.source: The default value is 554 if the server type is "Application Virtualization Server" and 80 if the server type is "Standard HTTP Server."
segment.target: The default value is 554 if the server type is "Application Virtualization Server" and 80 if the server type is "Standard HTTP Server."

segment.source: Path—This field defaults to "/" and is read-only when the server type is "Application Virtualization Server" or “Enhanced Security Application Virtualization Server”.
segment.target: Path—This field defaults to "/" and is read-only when the server type is "Application Virtualization Server" or “Enhanced Security Application Virtualization Server”.

segment.source: When the server type is “Standard HTTP Server” or “Enhanced Security HTTP Server”, the Path field is also editable.
segment.target: When the server type is “Standard HTTP Server” or “Enhanced Security HTTP Server”, the Path field is also editable.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Select this menu item to open a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Select this menu item to open a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: You can use this menu item to create a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: You can use this menu item to create a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: This pop-up list of menu items enables you to change the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: This pop-up list of menu items enables you to change the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Select this item to refresh the management console.
segment.target: Select this item to refresh the management console.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: This item displays the help system for the management console.
segment.target: This item displays the help system for the management console.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: Publishing Servers Results Pane
